content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the klaipėda district court the court made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property in a divorce case the court considered the principle of equal shares but also took into account the needs of the applicant and the children involved the defendant has been ordered to pay maintenance for the children both parties presented their arguments and evidence and the court made a decision based on the information provided the court determined the division of property awarded compensation to each party addressed joint debts and ordered the payment of maintenance for the children the court also addressed the costs of the proceedings and ordered the payment of stamp duty and representation costs

metadata.cost: 518.00 EUR (stamp duty) + € 200.00 EUR (professional fees) to be borne by the defendant; 1'080,00 (professional fees) to be borne by the plaintiff.
